definitions.definition: Ready to accept instruction or direction; obedient; subservient.
Yielding to control or supervision, direction, or management.
examples: Such literature may well be anathema to those, who are too docile and petty for their own good.

main_definition: Ready to accept instruction or direction; obedient; subservient.
secondary_definitions: Yielding to control or supervision, direction, or management.
